*The BNF*

{{{

<class_statement> ::= [public] class Name [extend Name] class_body End

class_body ::= class_body class_member |
               empty

class_member ::= class_function|
                 class_variable|

access_specifier ::= public|
                     private|
                     protected


class_function ::= [access_specifier] function Name funcbody End

class_variable ::= [access_specifier] Name ['=' exp]







}}}
